      This method takes the path variable commentId as an argument plus the token from the Authorization header and then calls commentService layer to delete the comments by commentID

    • Method Detail

      • createComment

        @PostMapping(value="/{postId}")
public Comment createComment(@Valid @RequestBody
                                                             @Valid Comment comment,
                                                             @PathVariable
                                                             java.lang.Long postId,
                                                             @RequestHeader(value="Authorization")
                                                             java.lang.String token)
                                                      throws TokenException,
                                                             PostNotExistException
        The method createComment takes three arguments: an instance of Comment, the Long pathvariable postId and a token. It calls createComment from the service layer so that a comment will be created and saved in the repository
        Throws:
        TokenException
        PostNotExistException

      • getCommentsByPostId

        @GetMapping(value="/{postId}")
public java.lang.Iterable<Comment> getCommentsByPostId(@PathVariable
                                                                                      java.lang.Long postId)
        This method takes the path variable postId as an argument and then calls commentService layer to get the comments by postID

      • deleteComment

        @DeleteMapping(value="/{commentId}")
public java.lang.Long deleteComment(@PathVariable
                                                                         java.lang.Long commentId,
                                                                         @RequestHeader(value="Authorization")
                                                                         java.lang.String token)
                                                                  throws UnauthorizeActionException,
                                                                         TokenException,
                                                                         CommentNotExistException
        This method takes the path variable commentId as an argument plus the token from the Authorization header and then calls commentService layer to delete the comments by commentID
        Throws:
        UnauthorizeActionException
        TokenException
        CommentNotExistException

        @GetMapping(value="/user")
public java.util.List<Comment> getCommentsByUser(@RequestHeader(value="Authorization")
                                                                            java.lang.String token)
                                                                     throws TokenException
        Delete Comments of the Post. That takes the postId as input and Call the deleteCommentsByPostId from commentService.
        Throws:
        TokenException
